@louisemcsharry Our cat tried to bring a live huge magpie in the cat flap today. I screamed so loud that the cat reversed & the bird got away. Cat had only had the flap reopened 2 days ago due to various murdering incidents. It’s locked again. 🙄

This is the logo for my Dad’s shop/ business that he set up in Ranelagh over 40 years ago. As… https://t.co/BPsPF6u3h5
Just realised it’s Friday the 13th. I’m in no way scared of this day, especially now when the worst has already happened with my Dad dying on the 5th of April. Still hasn’t fully sunk in.
I know my Dad was well known on the Dublin music scene but I can’t get over the amount of people mourning his passing. I’m so proud to call him my Dad. I always have been. https://t.co/mXkaMEoS9i
@edsongsofpraise Thanks very much for your lovely messages. It means a lot.
@vinny_ryan49 Thanks very much for your tweet. I’m one of Larry’s daughters.
My Dad & EV his dog/best pal. https://t.co/QULSyXFj3l

@edsongsofpraise I’m proud to say I’m one of Larry’s 5 kids. I heard there was lots of people talking online about him passing away so I took a look & I can’t get over how many people are talking about him. He’d be his usual humble self if I told him.
I’m so proud to be one of Larry’s 5 kids. Best parent ever. Our hearts are broken. https://t.co/cnZJ7geoke
Glad to hear there’s a higher voting turnout number then normal so far. #RepealTheEighth

@RanelaghLife Hi, I’m one of Larry from Sound Hire’s 5 kids. We’re having a get together at Ranelagh arts centre on Tuesday 5th of June from 7-9pm. That’s the 2nd month anniversary of when he died. Would you mind retweeting please?

@louisemcsharry My daughter was so bad we got kicked out of the mother & baby group that I feckin set up! I’m sorry if lots of people have said this to you, but kids go through lots of phases. All difficult. Sam will improve soon.
Though something tells me the tickets didn’t sell out because there were a huge amount of celebs at it with free tickets. There was a fair few people there all the same!
@AlexinCork No bother to you. Lucky you’re up early & won’t have to wait through all the other competitors to do yours.
At least 8 separate people’s Instagram or Snapchat stories were of The Rolling Stones. Looked like an amazing gig.
